statements: SELECT * FROM Reports
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM Reports
SELECT report_name, reviewer_id FROM Reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Reports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT report_name FROM Reports WHERE reviewer_id = 100
SELECT * FROM Reports WHERE report_id = 1
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM Reports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND reviewer_id = 3 ORDER BY report_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT reviewer_id FROM Reports
SELECT COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM Reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports;
SELECT report_title, report_date FROM risk_assessment_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_title, report_date FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT index_id, report_id, index_type FROM index_optimization ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT report_title, report_date FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE report_title LIKE '%risk%';
SELECT report_id, report_title FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(index_id) AS average_index_id, index_type FROM index_optimization GROUP BY index_type HAVING COUNT(report_id) > 5 ORDER BY average_index_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE report_title LIKE 'Risk%' AND report_content NOT LIKE '%confidential%' ORDER BY report_id;
SELECT report_id, COUNT(index_id) AS num_indexes FROM index_optimization GROUP BY report_id HAVING num_indexes >= 3 ORDER BY num_indexes DESC, report_id ASC;

SELECT report_id, report_date, report_content FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND LENGTH(report_content) > 100 ORDER BY report_date ASC, report_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM risk_assessment_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT decision_maker_name, decision_maker_role FROM decision_makers;
SELECT * FROM assessment_comments WHERE comment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM risk_assessment_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM decision_makers WHERE decision_maker_role = 'Manager';
SELECT report_name, risk_level FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM assessment_comments ORDER BY comment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports;
SELECT report_title, report_date FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT report_content FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT status_name FROM assessment_status;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT report_title, report_date FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;

SELECT u.user_name, r.report_title, s.status_name FROM users u JOIN access_control ac ON u.user_id = ac.user_id JOIN risk_ass_report r ON ac.report_id = r.id JOIN assessment_status s ON ac.status_id = s.status_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM risk_assessment_reports;
SELECT risk_id, report_date, report_content FROM risk_assessment_reports;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_index WHERE report_score > 80;
SELECT comment_content FROM risk_assessment_comments WHERE risk_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM risk_assessment_users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT risk_id, history_timestamp FROM risk_assessment_history ORDER BY history_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports LIMIT 5;
SELECT risk_id, report_date, report_content FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE risk_id = 1;
SELECT r.report_date, c.comment_content FROM risk_assessment_reports r JOIN risk_assessment_comments c ON r.risk_id = c.risk_id;
SELECT u.username, u.email, r.report_date FROM risk_assessment_users u JOIN risk_assessment_reports r ON u.user_id = r.risk_id;
SELECT r.risk_id, r.report_date, h.history_timestamp FROM risk_assessment_reports r JOIN risk_assessment_history h ON r.risk_id = h.risk_id ORDER BY h.history_timestamp DESC;
